beam_shot module¶

class beam_shot.Beam_Shot(anim, start_pos, angle, collidables, power, damage, radius)¶

Bases: explosive.Explosive

A class for any weapon that has the ability to explode.

Parameters:
  • anim – The sprite sheet to use for animating.
  • start_pos – Will get passed to projectile.
  • angle – Will get passed to projectile.
  • collidables – Sprites that the Beam_Shot can collide with.
update(world)¶
